drug-and-dosage-to-text.template: {dosage} of {drug} was given to a patient. Please write a short medical report about this.

find-drug-and-dosage-two-questions.template:
Read the below text and answer the two following questions.

Text: {text}


Question 1: What is the drug in the above text?

Question 2: What is the dosage of it?

You should answer in the "drug" and "dosage" format (e.g., Aspirin and 500mg)

find-drug-and-dosage.template:
Read the below text and answer the question.

Text: {text}

Question: What are the drug and its dosage of the above text? 

You should answer in the "drug" and "dosage" format (e.g., Aspirin and 500mg)
